## Validate.toConditionSetToken() function

Converts a string to a [ConditionSetToken](./ts-res.conditionsettoken.md) if it is a valid condition set token.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toConditionSetToken(token: string): Result<ConditionSetToken>;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ConditionSetToken](./ts-res.conditionsettoken.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [ConditionSetToken](./ts-res.conditionsettoken.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
